tool.title: MP4 to MP3 Converter
tool.subtitle: Easily extract audio from your videos. Convert your MP4 files to high-quality MP3 audio format.

how_it_works.title: How to Convert MP4 to MP3?
how_it_works.subtitle: Convert your videos to audio in just three simple steps.

step1.title: Select Your MP4 File
step1.description: Click the "Browse Files" button or drag and drop your video into the upload area.

step2.title: Click Convert
step2.description: Press the "Convert" button to start extracting audio from your video.

step3.title: Download Your MP3
step3.description: When conversion is complete, the "Download" button will appear to download your new MP3 file.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Is it safe to use this tool?
faq.a1: Yes, absolutely. Your privacy is important to us. All uploaded files are automatically deleted from our servers after 1 hour.
faq.q2: How long does the conversion process take?
faq.a2: Conversion speed depends on file size, but thanks to our powerful servers, most files are processed in less than a minute.
faq.a3: We use advanced encoders to maintain the best possible audio quality. Quality loss is negligible.
